remarks: ` gcdOLD ( A , B ) ` is the largest positive integer that evenly divides both ` A ` and ` B ` .  (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 17-Jun-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
df-gcdOLD $p |- gcdOLD ( A , B ) = sup ( { x e. NN | ( ( A / x ) e. NN /\ ( B / x ) e. NN ) } , NN , < ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
